Package com.ecom.utils

package com.ecom.utils
Utility classes for the application

This package contains various utility classes that provide common functionalities such as reading configuration properties, managing Excel files, taking screenshots, and handling dynamic XPaths.

Example usages include:

  • Reading configuration values using ConfigReader
  • Reading data from Excel files using ExcelReader
  • Taking screenshots using ScreenshotTaker
  • Generating dynamic XPath expressions using DynamicXpath
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConfigReader
    ConfigReader class for reading configuration properties.
    DataProviderLocal
    DatProviderLocal class for providing test data to TestNG test methods.
    DynamicXpath
    DynamicXpath class for generating dynamic XPath expressions.
    ExcelReader
    ExcelReader class for reading data from Excel sheets.
    ScreenshotTaker
    ScreenShotTaker class for taking screenshots in Base64 format.
